title: E-commerce Website
description: Developed a responsive e-commerce platform using React, Tailwind CSS, Node.js, and Express.
Improved user engagement by 20% with optimized UI and seamless mobile experience.
Integrated a secure payment gateway and streamlined the checkout process.

title: Restaurant Website
description: Built a restaurant ordering web app with JavaScript, EJS, Node.js, and Express.
Designed an interactive menu and user-friendly interface with SCSS.
Integrated order tracking and simplified the checkout workflow.
Improved customer engagement for local food businesses.

title: Weather App
description: Created a weather forecasting app using Node.js and Express.
Fetched real-time weather data using a public API for any searched city.
Displayed temperature, humidity, and weather conditions in a clean UI.
Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript for a responsive experience.
